about.name: Le Lyu
about.description: A senior at Boston College, I double major in Econ and CS. I work as a Lab Consultant and Teaching Assistant with a passion for coding, financial forecasting, data analysis, and task automation.
interests: Caring for pets (owns a 5-month old Golden British Long Hair)

jobs.title: Lab Consultant at Digital Humanities Lab, Boston College
Teaching Assistant for the course Data Visualization
Teaching Assistant for the course Algorithm

projects.title: What model best predicts revenue for Domino's Pizza?

news.content: I'm starting to believe that God has a plan for all of us.
Mary Mulkeen emailed me and asked if I would like to be an TA for Algorithm with professor Alexander Creiner. I said yes. Challenging course but very smart professor.
Nam Wook Kim emailed me and asked if I would like to be an TA for Data Visualization with him. I said yes. Best course and best professor ever.
I joined DHL as a Lab Consultant with Dr. Brittany Lehman. She is amazing and is the best person I've known at Boston College. I wish her all the best at UC Berkley!
